mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( board_num, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_writer, board_like, board_views ) VALUES ( board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, '임시글쓴이', 0, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT board_num, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_writer, board_like, board_views FROM (select A.BOARD_NUM, A.BOARD_TITLE, A.BOARD_CONTENT, A.BOARD_DATE, A.BOARD_WRITER, A.BOARD_LIKE, A.BOARD_VIEwS, rownum as rnum from ( SELECT BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_LIKE, BOARD_VIEws from board order by BOARD_DATE desc, BOARD_NUM desc ) A ) where rnum between #{sizePerPage}*#{page}-9 and #{sizePerPage}*#{page}
SELECT count(BOARD_NUM) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUM > 0
SELECT board_num, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_writer, board_like, board_views FROM BOARD WHERE board_num = #{boardNum}
SELECT board_num, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_writer, board_like, board_views FROM board where board_writer in ( select popo_id from popouser where popo_num = #{popoNum} );
